text: Landau an der Isar is the second-largest town in the Lower Bavarian district, or Landkreis, of Dingolfing-Landau, in the state of Bavaria, Germany. It is on the river Isar, 120 km downstream from Munich. In 2020, its population was around 14,000. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Website of the town's Gymnasium * Landauer Zeitung (local newspaper; available through following link) Category:Dingolfing-Landau
title: Landau an der Isar
